name: py-rasterio
description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: gdal
dependencies.description:
GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) is a translator library for
raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
X/MIT style Open Source license by the Open Source Geospatial
Foundation. As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data
model and vector abstract data model to the calling application for all
supported formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line
utilities for data translation and processing.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-affine
dependencies.description: Matrices describing affine transformation of the plane.

dependencies.name: py-certifi
dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-cligj
dependencies.description:
Click-based argument and option decorators for Python GIS command line
programs

dependencies.name: py-click-plugins
dependencies.description:
An extension module for py-click to register external CLI commands via
setuptools entry-points.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-xarray
dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-geocube
dependent_to.description: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, transforms, and models for geospatial data. TorchGeo
is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, that provides
datasets, transforms, samplers, and pre-trained models specific to
geospatial data.
